Devilcat::

The hum of Devilcat's laser sword is Kaiser's only warning as the 
Rogue Commander decloaks right behind him and slashes.  A very 
typical maneuver for any Rogue - and Devilcat believes in leading by 
example.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser::
>        He shouts after Rodimus.  "We shall meet again Rodimus 
Prime.  And I 
> am looking forward to it.  I think I would enjoy our battle.  Until 
then."  
> He stands between the retreating Rodimus and the rest of the 
battle.  He lays 
> down a covering fire pattern across the battle to distract them 
during the 
> escape.
